Londonderry, N.H., (January 16, 2014) – Verani Realty announced today it finished 2013 as the No. 1 real estate brokerage in New Hampshire in units sold and total volume. Verani Realty agents closed over 3,000 transactions in 2013 and ended the year with a significant share of the New Hampshire real estate market. “Our formula […]
